mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mgt_tele_marketing (account_id, cnt, valid_cnt, price, status,creation_date) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{cnt}, #{validCnt}, #{price}, #{status},#{creationDate})
mapper.sql: m.batch_id as batchId,m.account_Id as accountId,m.cnt as cnt, m.valid_cnt as validCnt, m.price as price,m.status as status, m.creation_date as creationDate
mapper.select: SELECT FROM mgt_tele_marketing m WHERE batch_id = #{batchId} AND status = 2

SELECT FROM mgt_tele_marketing m WHERE m.batch_id in ( SELECT MAX(batch_id) FROM mgt_tele_marketing WHERE account_id in (select account_id from mgt_accounts WHERE org_id in (select org_id FROM mgt_accounts WHERE account_id = #{accountId}) ) ) and m.status = 2

SELECT FROM mgt_tele_marketing m where m.account_Id in(select account_id from mgt_accounts WHERE org_id in (select org_id FROM mgt_accounts WHERE account_id = #{accountId})) AND m.status != 0 order by m.creation_date desc
SELECT FROM mgt_tele_marketing m where m.status = #{status} ORDER BY m.batch_id
